name: Squares (itch) (NokeDev)
description:
This is an infinite runner/sidescroller where you play as two squares jumping from platform to platform. Might seem easy but watch out for the deadly laser coming your way!

You have to press each key at least once for the key images to disappear.

I have been working with game development for a few months and this is the first game that I've uploaded to itch.io.
